oracle.pg.common

Class OracleFileSplitterConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.common.OracleFileSplitterConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OracleDataLoaderConfigBase

    public class OracleFileSplitterConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    A class specifying all the configuration settings when splitting an input stream into multiple chunks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OracleFileSplitterConfig

        public OracleFileSplitterConfig()

    • Method Detail

      • getBatchSizeToDebug

        public long getBatchSizeToDebug()
        The batch size to use when reporting the loading progress

      • getDataLoaderListener

        public DataLoaderListener getDataLoaderListener()
        Returns the data loader listener associated to this configuration object
        Returns:
        a DataLoaderListener object.

      • getDOP

        public int getDOP()
        Get the degree of parallelism used for data loading. It has to be a positive integer. Default value is set to 4.
        Returns:
        the degree of parallelism for data loading

      • getEdgeIDOffset

        public long getEdgeIDOffset()
        Get the offset of the edge ID. This means that the edge ID for all the edges loaded from the file would have an ID of edgeID + edge ID offset. The default value is 0, which means all edges will have the same ID as specified in the file.
        Returns:
        the offset for edges IDs

      • getEdgeSrcMaxlines

        public long getEdgeSrcMaxlines()
        Get the maximum number of lines to load from the edges file. This means that only edges before the given line offset will be loaded. The default value is -1, which means all edges in the file will be loaded.
        Returns:
        the maximum number of lines to load from the edges file

      • getEdgeSrcOffsetlines

        public long getEdgeSrcOffsetlines()
        Get the line offset of edges. This parameter specifies that only edges after the given line offset will be loaded. The default value is 0, which means all edges in the file will be loaded.
        Returns:
        the line offset of edges

      • getInstance

        public static OracleFileSplitterConfig getInstance()
        Create an OracleFileSpliterConfig with the default settings.

      • getInstance

        public static OracleFileSplitterConfig getInstance(long lVertexSrcOffsetlines,
                                                   long lEdgeSrcOffsetlines,
                                                   long lVertexSrcMaxlines,
                                                   long lEdgeSrcMaxlines,
                                                   long lVertexIDOffset,
                                                   long lEdgeIDOffset,
                                                   int iDop,
                                                   int iPartitions,
                                                   int iOffset,
                                                   DataLoaderListener dll)
        Creates a new OracleDataLoader config object .
        Parameters:
        lVertexSrcOffsetlines - the line offset of vertices. Loading vertices after the offset. Default is 0.
        lEdgeSrcOffsetlines - the line offset of edges. Loading edges after the offset. Default is 0.
        lVertexSrcMaxlines - the max lines of vertices to be loaded. Default is -1 (i.e., load all vertices)
        lEdgeSrcMaxlines - the max lines of edges to be loaded. Default is -1 (i.e., load all edges)
        lVertexIDOffset - the offset of vertex ID. That is, the vertex ID would be vertexID+lVertexIDOffset. Default is 0
        lEdgeIDOffset - the offset of edge ID. That is, the edge ID would be edgeID+lEdgeIDOffset. Default is 0
        iDop - degree of parallelism. It has to be a positive integer.
        iPartitions - number of partitions (i.e., data loading clients)
        iOffset - offset of partitions. It is from 0 to iPartitions-1
        dll - a DataLoaderListener object.

      • getPartitionsOffset

        public int getPartitionsOffset()
        Get the offset of the partition (i.e. data loading clients) that the data loader has to process. The value for this parameters vary from 0 to getTotalPartitions() - 1. The default value is 0.
        Returns:
        the offset of the partitions.

      • getTotalPartitions

        public int getTotalPartitions()
        Get the total number of partitions (i.e. data loading clients) that the data loader has to split the files into.
        Returns:
        the total number of partitions

      • getVertexIDOffset

        public long getVertexIDOffset()
        Get the offset of the vertex ID. This means that the vertex ID for all the vertices loaded from the file would have an ID of vertexID + Vertex ID offset. The default value is 0, which means all vertices will have the same ID as specified in the file.
        Returns:
        the offset for vertices IDs

      • getVertexSrcMaxlines

        public long getVertexSrcMaxlines()
        Get the maximum number of lines to load from the vertices file. This means that only vertices before the given line offset will be loaded. The default value is -1, which means all vertices in the file will be loaded.
        Returns:
        the maximum number of lines to load from the vertices file

      • getVertexSrcOffsetlines

        public long getVertexSrcOffsetlines()
        Get the line offset of vertices. This parameter specifies that only vertices after the given line offset will be loaded. The default value is 0, which means all vertices in the file will be loaded.
        Returns:
        the line offset of vertices.

      • setBatchSizeToDebug

        public void setBatchSizeToDebug(long size)
        Set the batch size to show debug information
        Parameters:
        size - the batch size that has a default value of 10000

      • setDataLoaderListener

        public void setDataLoaderListener(DataLoaderListener dll)
        Set the data loader listener associated to this configuration object
        Parameters:
        dll - a DataLoaderListener object.

      • setDOP

        public void setDOP(int iDop)
        Set the degree of parallelism used for data loading. It has to be a positive integer. Default value is set to 4.
        Parameters:
        iDop - the degree of parallelism for data loading

      • setEdgeIDOffset

        public void setEdgeIDOffset(long lEdgeIDOffset)
        Set the offset of the edge ID. This means that the edge ID for all the edges loaded from the file would have an ID of edgeID + edge ID offset. The default value is 0, which means all edges will have the same ID as specified in the file.
        Parameters:
        lEdgeIDOffset - the offset for edges IDs

      • setEdgeSrcMaxlines

        public void setEdgeSrcMaxlines(long lSrcMaxlines)
        Set the maximum number of lines to load from the edges file. This means that only edges before the given line offset will be loaded. The default value is -1, which means all edges in the file will be loaded.
        Parameters:
        lSrcMaxlines - the maximum number of lines to load from the edges file

      • setEdgeSrcOffsetlines

        public void setEdgeSrcOffsetlines(long lSrcOffsetlines)
        Set the line offset of edges. This parameter specifies that only edges after the given line offset will be loaded. The default value is 0, which means all edges in the file will be loaded.
        Parameters:
        lSrcOffsetlines - the line offset of vertices. Loading edges after the offset. Default is 0.

      • setPartitionsOffset

        public void setPartitionsOffset(int iOffset)
        Set the offset of the partition (i.e. data loading clients) that the data loader has to process. The value for this parameters vary from 0 to getTotalPartitions() - 1. The default value is 0.
        Parameters:
        iOffset - the offset of the partitions.

      • setTotalPartitions

        public void setTotalPartitions(int iPartitions)
        Set the total number of partitions (i.e. data loading clients) that the data loader has to split the files into.
        Parameters:
        iPartitions - the total number of partitions

      • setVertexIDOffset

        public void setVertexIDOffset(long lVertexIDOffset)
        Set the offset of the vertex ID. This means that the vertex ID for all the vertices loaded from the file would have an ID of vertexID + Vertex ID offset. The default value is 0, which means all vertices will have the same ID as specified in the file.
        Parameters:
        lVertexIDOffset - the offset for vertices IDs

      • setVertexSrcMaxlines

        public void setVertexSrcMaxlines(long lSrcMaxlines)
        Set the maximum number of lines to load from the vertices file. This means that only vertices before the given line offset will be loaded. The default value is -1, which means all vertices in the file will be loaded.
        Parameters:
        lSrcMaxlines - the maximum number of lines to load from the vertices file

      • setVertexSrcOffsetlines

        public void setVertexSrcOffsetlines(long lSrcOffsetlines)
        Set the line offset of vertices. This parameter specifies that only vertices after the given line offset will be loaded. The default value is 0, which means all vertices in the file will be loaded.
        Parameters:
        lSrcOffsetlines - the line offset of vertices. Loading vertices after the offset. Default is 0.
